title: Nowhere Man #1.1
description: This series is a police drama and psychological thriller that will draw you in. Meet riveting characters on the verge of uncovering a web of secrets that will change their lives forever. Haunted by his father's death, NYPD detective, Jack Maguire tries to prove himself, placing his own life at risk, but Jack has a few tricks on hand.
author: Jerome Walford
